item.description:
This annual one day sesshin will take place in New Hartford at the Dae Yen Sa Temple. It will include sitting meditation (zazen), sacred chants, mindful walking (kinhin) and eating, hatha yoga and discussion. This year's theme is "This Unrepeatable Moment" that underscores presence and the profound sense of gratitude. Home-made Korean lunch is included. To register visit our New England Institute of Buddhist Studies. Open to members and non-members and, from beginner's to advanced. There will be no gathering at Wesleyan.

To register, visit our main website  at www.bffct.net 

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
item.how_to_find_us: Google the location in New Hartford. Please register first. See our web site.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Buddhist Meetup Group - Mindfulness One Day Retreat
